snippet.title: Trailblazers: Into the March - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
▶ Wishlist now on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2671300/Trailblazers_Into_the_March/

Trailblazers: Into the March is an upcoming colony-sim that combines tactical combat with the management and emotional aspects of a fully-fleshed out procedural crew.
Set off on the journey of a lifetime aboard your Landship,  a customizable earthly Leaviathan that will carry you and your crew across the March, a mysterious mass of land that engulfs civilizations in its wake.
Recruit crew members with their own backgrounds and skills, trade supplies and materials, and take on contracts to further your expedition. Manage your crew's daily lives, witness their evolving relationships and stories, and defend your moving home in tactical landship battles as you explore the vast uncharted territories.
Something perilous yet necessary awaits you at the end of the journey. Do you have what it takes to become a Trailblazer?


▶ Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/pNKgjxXj8D
▶ Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/intothemarchh/
▶ Follow us on Twitter: https://x.com/intothemarch
▶ Follow us on Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@intothemarch
▶ Join the community on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TrailblazersGame/
▶ A game crafted by Strangers: https://strangers.dev

Teaser Trailer Credits

Animation: Vincent Chea Oum, Raoul Faure, Estelle Hacquart, Jean da Ros
Art & Trailblazers Logo: Adrien Cantone
Additional UI: Alyssa Tomala
Sound Design & Mixing: Manuel Oberholzer
Music Composition: Yeva Avramenko
Music Arrangement: Vincent Borcard
Editing: Vincent Chea Oum, Adrien Cantone, Arnaud Gattlen, 
Voice acting: Justice Washington, Tom Schalk, Abigail Paige Wahl
& the Strangers team, who made this possible.

▶ Wishlist now on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2671300/Trailblazers_Into_the_March
